item.title: Installation Python and GrovePi required modules
item.description: Download and install the latest version of Python 3.x from the official Python website Install pip Install Visual C++ Build Tools(http://landinghub.visualstudio.com/visual-cpp-build-tools). This is a pre-requisite for installing netifaces. Install the required Python modules Eclipse paho netinterfaces open terminal or console and type the following command pip install paho-mqtt pip install netifaces
